div.span: Hepatic adenoma in a patient with Von Gierke's glycogen storage disease
Hepatic Pseudoaneurysm folowing Percutaneous Liver Biopsy
Primary cerebral neuroblastoma (PNET) of the corpus callosum, with spontaneous intraventricular hemorrhage
Incidental Aneurysm, Risk of Rupture and aneurysm size
AVM embolization clips in Right lower lung & Left hilar region, interstitial and vascular markings at bases
Occlusion of the left internal carotid. 50% lesion at the bulb and take-off of the right internal carotid (possibly ulcerated).
